LanguageData.HayRack.label: hay rack
LanguageData.HayRack.description: A simple rack for drying hay into straw.
LanguageData.QuernHighTech.label: milling machine
LanguageData.QuernHighTech.description: Electric variant of the milling stone. Require electricity to operate, but it takes a very short time to process wheat. Very efficeint.
LanguageData.QuernLowTech.label: milling stone
LanguageData.QuernLowTech.description: Basic milling stone. Does not require electricity nor fuel to operate, but it takes long time to process wheat.
LanguageData.VLW_ElectricOven.label: electric oven
LanguageData.VLW_ElectricOven.description: An electric oven for baking bread and cake.
LanguageData.VLW_FueledOven.label: fueled oven
LanguageData.VLW_FueledOven.description: A wood-fueled oven for baking bread.
